name: Cosmic Beast Passive T3
owner: The Beast, Beast Eddie, Magma Beast Eddie, or Number of the Beast Eddie character.
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Remove Immunity and Perfect Immunity from all enemies at the start of battle
Deal True Damage that ignores damage immunity, to each enemy equal to 50% of their MAX HP for every burn currently present on them, every action
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to The Beast, Beast Eddie, Magma Beast Eddie, or Number of the Beast Eddie character.
